comments.text:
Bug 1603006 has been causing regressions in release, this patch reverts enough of that change to fix these regressions.

This is preferable to a backout since other changes have been made to this code since Bug 1603006.
comments.creator: pbone@mozilla.com
comments.author: pbone@mozilla.com

Bug 1603006 has been causing regressions in release, this patch reverts enough of that change to fix these regressions.

This is preferable to a backout since other changes have been made to this code since Bug 1603006.
[Tracking Requested - why for this release]: Requesting tracking because this should fix problems users have been experiencing in release.
comments.author: pbone@mozilla.com
